availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mathew W. Cole (McCracken County, Kentucky, notary public, justice of the peace, and clerk)

body.p: McCracken County, Kentucky, notary pubic, and clerk. Augusta County, Virginia, native. Son of James Cole and Fanny Cole. Married to Catherine Cole. Father of Mathew Cole. Clerk in McCracken County in 1850. Bank clerk in McCracken County in 1860. Notary public for the Commercial Bank of Kentucky in McCracken County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, p. 141B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, p. 914.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, p. 117A.
Virginia, U.S., Extracted Vital Records (1660-1923), Judith McGhan, p. 665 of 880 of microfilm.
KYR-0001-017-0100.
